targets.rawSql:
WITH keyed AS (
    SELECT public_key,
           COUNT(*) AS duplicate_count,
           ARRAY_AGG(node_id ORDER BY node_id) AS duplicate_nodes
    FROM stridetastic_api_node
    WHERE public_key IS NOT NULL
      AND public_key <> ''
    GROUP BY public_key
)
SELECT
    n.node_id,
    n.short_name,
    n.long_name,
    n.mac_address,
    n.public_key,
    n.is_virtual,
    n.is_low_entropy_public_key,
    COALESCE(k.duplicate_count, 0) AS duplicate_count,
    CASE
        WHEN COALESCE(k.duplicate_count, 0) > 1 THEN ARRAY_REMOVE(k.duplicate_nodes, n.node_id)
        ELSE ARRAY[]::text[]
    END AS duplicate_peers,
    n.first_seen,
    n.last_seen
FROM stridetastic_api_node n
LEFT JOIN keyed k ON k.public_key = n.public_key
WHERE n.is_low_entropy_public_key = TRUE OR COALESCE(k.duplicate_count, 0) > 1
ORDER BY
    COALESCE(n.public_key, '') ASC,
    n.node_id ASC
LIMIT 200;
